LOGIN.TITLE: Login
LOGIN.SUBTITLE: Start by entering your email address
LOGIN.ERRORALREADYREGISTERED: Already registered with that email address.
LOGIN.ERRORFORGOT: Please check your email, if you have an account you will receive a password reset link.
LOGIN.ERRORINCOMPLETE: Please fill out all required fields.
LOGIN.ERROR: Could not login. Check your email and password.
LOGIN.ERRORREGISTER: Could not register. You may already have an account with this email address.
LOGIN.ERRORPASSWORD: Passwords must contain letters, numbers, symbols, and be a minimum of 8 characters long.
LOGIN.ALREADYLOGGED: You are logged in as {{first}}. Click to log out to use a different account.
